thread.title: CNN Doctors Picture of Oregon Killer Chris Harper-Mercer to Make Him Look White | Opinion - Conservative
thread.title_full: CNN Doctors Picture of Oregon Killer Chris Harper-Mercer to Make Him Look White | Opinion - Conservative

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: CNN Doctors Picture of Oregon Killer Chris Harper-Mercer to Make Him Look White | Opinion - Conservative
text:
(Before It's News)
As if in a desperate bid to back up the Los Angeles Times’s absurd assertion that Chris-Harper-Mercer was a white supremacist , CNN has been attempting to transform him in the public mind into a Caucasian. Via The Last Refuge :
On the left is the selfie Christopher Mercer uploaded to his social media. On the right is how CNN presented the same selfie in broadcast stories about him. Why did CNN need to change the complexion (color) of their broadcast? Why is no-one showing pictures of mom, Laurel Margaret Harper?
An old picture of his mother provides the answer:
But the media is happy to show you pictures of his white father.
As for the killer’s supposed “white-supremacy leanings”:
The media has gone well beyond spinning the news. Leftist outfits like La Times and CNN deal in outright lies intended to advance an agenda that is hostile in the extreme to normal Americans.
On tips from Bill T, MicahStone, and Torcer.
